rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with Vastu-compliant placement to invite positive energy. It includes ample natural light and a subtle water feature to balance energies.
An open, airy living room designed for socializing and relaxation, featuring large windows oriented towards the east or south to align with Vastu principles for prosperity and positivity.
A dining area adjacent to the living room, designed for hosting meals. The layout is balanced according to Vastu guidelines to ensure harmonious energy flow.
A dedicated home office space with a quiet ambiance, located on the ground floor for convenience and minimal distractions as per modern design trends and practicality.
One of three bedrooms (3BHK) that includes a spacious balcony. The bedroom is designed to maximize natural light with Vastu-aligned windows and a private balcony for relaxation.
Ensuite bathroom adjacent to one of the bedrooms, ensuring privacy and convenience.

openings.notes: Entrance door placed according to Vastu to welcome positive energy. Includes a foyer area for transition.
Windows oriented towards east and south to allow maximum natural light and align with Vastu principles of prosperity.
Each bedroom is equipped with a private balcony for fresh air and relaxation. Balconies are designed with minimalistic railings to maintain an open view.
Stairs leading to the first floor (G+1) ensuring smooth transition. Placed in the north-east corner following Vastu guidelines for stability and growth.

rooms.description: A spacious bedroom with a balcony designed to maximize natural light and offer privacy. The room layout follows Vastu principles by placing the bed in the south-west corner.
Ensuite bathroom adjacent to the second bedroom, ensuring privacy and convenience for residents.
A roof terrace integrated with a garden space, providing an expansive area for relaxation and social gatherings. This space also aligns with Vastu by encouraging upward energy flow.

openings.notes: Access to the roof terrace is designed for easy transition between floors.
